title: This AirPods and HomePod mini bundle is $50 off right now
content:
Macworld

One of the best bundles we’ve seen in a long time is on sale right now, featuring the Apple AirPods 2nd gen and the HomePod Mini for just $180 at Best Buy, down from its original $230 MSRP. Basically, you can get awesome audio whether you’re on the go or at home.

The 2nd Gen AirPods come with some awesome features. Powered by the Apple H1 headphone chip, these AirPods provide hands-free access to Siri using just your voice, making it easier to manage tasks on the go.

In our review of the AirPods 2nd Gen, our expert gave these earbuds a 4.5/5 star rating, and the super easy access to Siri was at the top of his list of reasons why you should get this model.

“We still think Siri needs to get a lot better and desperately needs the ability to fully function with third-party music services just as well as it does with Apple Music. But AirPods are best in situations where your hands are occupied: at the gym, riding a bike, bundled up in freezing cold weather. I didn’t realize how useful it would be to use Siri with my phone in my pocket and my hands full until I had the ability to,” Jason Cross wrote.

The stellar battery life, rich audio, and clear voice are among the things that make the AirPods 2nd Gen worth buying.

The HomePod mini is also part of this bundle. This small smart speaker has a great design and a decent sound, earning a 3.5/5 star rating. The speaker provides 360-degree sound and can serve as an easy way to access the smart assistant.

This bundle combines the convenience of portable earbuds with the powerful sound of a smart speaker, making it ideal for a wide range of listening needs. Don’t miss the chance to get this awesome bundle for $50 off at Best Buy since the deal won’t last forever.
